text.0: we with great reverence have approached the youngest who hath shone forth wellkindled in his dwelling.
text.1: with wondrous light between wide earth and heaven wellworshipped looking forth in all directions.
text.2: through his great might oercoming all misfortunes praised in the house is agni jātavedas.
text.3: may he protect us from disgrace and trouble both us who laud him and our noble patrons.
text.4: o agni thou art varuṇa and mitra vasisthas with their holy hymns exalt thee.
text.5: with thee be most abundant gain of treasure ye gods preserve us evermore with blessings.
